title: Stellantis Leadership Team - Company | Stellantis
snippet: He joined Chrysler Group in 2007 as lead purchasing executive for raw materials and stamping and subsequently held a series of leadership positions in the Finance and Purchasing organizations. In 2012, he led the development of a global finance platform strategy to identify areas where the company could improve its standardization efforts. Subsequently, he was responsible for all vehicle and powertrain capital expenditures on a global basis. From 2016 until 2018, he was Chief Purchasing Officer for Fiat Chrysler Automobiles.

title: Michael Manley (CEO) - Wikipedia
snippet: He previously served as managing director of the North American operations of Stellantis. In 2018 Manley was appointed as CEO of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA), following the announcement that previous CEO Sergio Marchionne would step down for health reasons.
